data.name: Undead
data.description:
Undead

Units:
-15% gold bounty
-30% buy cost
-30% buy cooldown
-10% Hero buy cooldown
6 HP/sec regeneration on Blight
No HP regeneration outside Blight
-10% attack rate
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
-5% cost

Traits: Quantity over quality. Most units are very weak and depend on high numbers rather than strength. Very susceptible to AoE magic damage. But they are cheap so spawn them often.

Difficulty: Expert

auras.name: Frost Aura
auras.description:
-25% unit move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(2000 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Frost Aura
auras.description:
-10% unit attack rate
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Frost Aura
auras.description:
-15% unit attack and move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Lich King's Mount [Q]
bonuses.description:
Sindragosa replaces Anub'arak

Special Unit (Melee)
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Dragon's Breath (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage in an area
Great Blizzard (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage in an area
(600-900 area of effect)
Take Flight (Damage Spell)
450-600 damage, 5 sec stun
Frost Core (Passive Skill)
60-90 damage to melee attacker

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Lost Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Lost Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

towerUpgrades.name: Raise Dead
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: can raise Skeletons
Affects: Death Knight

Lv1: raises Skeleton Warrior for 25 sec
(20% to block an attack)
Lv2: raises Skeleton Maceman for 25 sec
(25% to do 2x and 1 sec stun)
(affects mechanical units only)
Lv3: raises Skeleton Mauler for 25 sec
(2x damage to buildings)
Lv4: raises Skeleton Juggernaut for 25 sec
(40% to do 3x damage)
(affects strong creeps only)

towerUpgrades.name: Vampiric Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: lifesteal to melee units
Affects: Death Knight
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 30% lifesteal in 300 AoE
Lv2: 50% lifesteal in 350 AoE
Lv3: 70% lifesteal in 400 AoE
Lv4: 90% lifesteal in 450 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Web Glands
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack range and ensnare
Affects: Crypt Fiend
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +50 range, 5 sec ensnare
Lv2: +100 range, 10 sec ensnare
Lv3: +150 range, 15 sec ensnare
Lv4: +200 range, 20 sec ensnare

towerUpgrades.name: Hollow Body
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and evasion
Affects: Ghoul, Crypt Fiend, Gargoyle and Banshee
(affects raised Skeletons)

Lv1: +5% attack rate, +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% attack rate, +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% attack rate, +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% attack rate, +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Dead Flesh
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: spell resist and 45% to reduce damage
Affects: Abomination

Lv1: -15% spell damage, reduces to 60
Lv2: -30% spell damage, reduces to 45
Lv3: -45% spell damage, reduces to 30
Lv4: -60% spell damage, reduces to 15

towerUpgrades.name: Disease Cloud
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor reduction and damage on death
Affects: Abomination

Lv1: -3 armor, 100 damage
Lv2: -6 armor, 200 damage
Lv3: -9 armor, 300 damage
Lv4: -12 armor, 400 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Crippling Cold
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: slows targeted unit
Affects: Necromancer, Banshee and Ziggurat
(affects raised Skeletal Mages)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 1 sec duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 15% slow for 5 sec
Lv2: 30% slow for 4 sec
Lv3: 45% slow for 3 sec
Lv4: 60% slow for 2 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Permafrost
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)
(affects raised Skeletal Mages)

Lv1: has Frosbite (reduces speed)
15%/20%/25%/30% slow for 60 sec
Lv2: has Frost Armor (cold armor)
+4/+6/+8 armor for 60 sec
Lv3: has Frost Nova (deals damage)
125/175 damage in 175 AoE
Lv4: has Possesion (steals unit)
75% to steal killing unit

spells.name: Fel Shield
spells.description: Dummy

towerUpgrades.name: Soul Rip
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: restore mana to Necropolis
Affects: Killed enemy Heroes
(affects organic Heroes only)

Lv1: +10 mana for a kill
Lv2: +20 mana for a kill
Lv3: +30 mana for a kill
Lv4: +40 mana for a kill
